title: PC is out of range?
body: Riot I tried to play a game tonight and it said that my rgb-pc was out of range. What am I suppose to do? Also could you get rid of my low priority? I literally got it because of this game. I tried multiple things but I couldn't do anything.

replies.body:
That generally happens if there is a resolution mismatch between the game and what your desktop/monitor is set at. I'd double check your in-game resolution settings, but if you can't get to those you can always do a general config reset to get the job done.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
